document_data.name: Borage
document_data.poisonousto: [[Illithid]]s{{Cite web/Candlekeep Forum/Questions for Ed Greenwood (2012)/07-13 - Illithid Allergies and Psionic Awakenings}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Borage''' was a typing of flowering [[herb]] found in the Realms.
document_data.Availability: * ''[[Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue (in-universe)|Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue]]'' sold borage under its "Aurora's Larder" section for 2 [[copper piece]]s per {{SI|1|ounce}}.
document_data.Usages:
* These plants could be used medicinally to treat coughs and various lung infections.
* These plants were a common form of seasoning in the Realms.
* All [[illithid]]s had an allergy to borage. Like other vegetation that illithids had known allergies for, borage could cause nausea, a strong desire to withdraw from others, and if consumed in large quantities could induce debilitatingly painful internal cramps and convulsions.
